channel.title: Projects on Zenvila
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Zenvila

item.title: DroneLogNLP: Real Time Semantic Analysis of Drone Logs
item.description: Transforms raw drone logs into semantic embeddings using Sentence Transformers for meaning-based search and analysis.

item.title: AI-Powered Web Vulnerability Scanner
item.description: AI-driven vulnerability scanner that automates penetration testing by generating fuzzing commands and using NLP to analyze terminal outputs.

item.title: Smart Real Estate Investor
item.description: Data-driven real estate investment analysis platform that scrapes property data and implements predictive models for ROI and investment risk assessment.

item.title: Lightweight PDF-based RAG System with LLaMA 3.1 8B
item.description: Fully Dockerized Retrieval-Augmented Generation system using LLaMA 3.1 8B with INT4 quantization for offline PDF question answering.

item.title: ViD-LLM Powered Visual Question Answering System
item.description: Local Visual Question Answering system using Salesforce/blip-vqa-base model deployed on CPU with Gradio interface for real-time multimodal reasoning.

item.title: CI/CD Pipeline with GitHub Actions and Docker
item.description: Complete CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, Docker, and Ubuntu runners with automated testing and containerized deployment.

item.title: Infrastructure Automation with Terraform and Ansible
item.description: Provisioned Docker-based Ubuntu environment using Terraform and configured Apache web server with Ansible for end-to-end infrastructure automation.

item.title: Multi-Node Kubernetes Cluster Using Kind
item.description: Set up and configured a multi-node Kubernetes cluster using Kind with Deployments, Services, Ingress, ConfigMaps, Secrets, and Helm charts.

item.title: ZenChat – Fully Dockerized Flask Chat Application
item.description: Lightweight real-time chat application using Flask and SQLite3, fully containerized with Docker for portable deployment.

item.title: ZenWallet – Dockerized MERN Stack Wallet Tracker
item.description: Full-stack wallet tracking application built with MERN stack and fully containerized with Docker Compose for multi-service orchestration.

item.title: Automated Timetable Management System
item.description: Web-based system to eliminate manual PDF searching for class or exam timetables with personalized access and admin management panel.

item.title: Docker Swarm Cluster Deployment on Multi-Node Architecture
item.description: Built Docker Swarm cluster using two physical machines running Arch Linux with manager and worker nodes for container orchestration.

item.title: Preserving Services with Faster Kernel Reboots Using Kexec
item.description: Updated kernel without rebooting using Kexec for seamless kernel switching and Live Kernel Patching for dynamic bug fixes, reducing boot times by 50%.

item.title: Expense Tracker
item.description: Web application for managing income and expenses with secure login, transaction tracking, and graphical data visualization.

item.title: Custom Cloud Deployment
item.description: Built fully functional, self-hosted cloud environment powered by Ubuntu Server 22.04 LTS with Monit for real-time monitoring and alerts.

item.title: VoIP (FreePBX+Twilio+Vapi)
item.description: Designed and deployed a scalable Voice over IP (VoIP) telecommunication system bridging local infrastructure with the global telephone network (PSTN).

item.title: Cloud-Integrated Enterprise VoIP Infrastructure
item.description: Designed and deployed a scalable Voice over IP (VoIP) telecommunication system bridging local infrastructure with the global telephone network (PSTN).

item.title: Monit Deployment
item.description: Implemented Monit for server monitoring and automation of error detection with fine-tuned alert mechanisms for system stability.

item.title: LLM Voice Assistant
item.description: LLM-powered voice assistant with object recognition using webcam, integrating OpenAI API and Google API for real-time analysis.

item.title: Cryptography with RSA and OpenSSL
item.description: Configured virtual environment with Ubuntu, Kali Linux, and Windows. Generated RSA key pairs, performed encryption/decryption, and set up Certificate Authority (CA).

item.title: FAST Aggregate Calculator
item.description: Deployed aggregate calculator for FAST entry test scores during internship to help students compute their entry test scores.

item.title: Voice over IP (VoIP) Setup
item.description: Set up Ubuntu as VoIP server with Asterisk, created clients for IP-based communication, and deployed on AWS EC2 with Docker containerization.

item.title: Arithmetic Logic Unit (ALU)
item.description: Developed ALU capable of performing addition, subtraction, and multiplication for Digital Logic Design course final project.

item.title: Programming for Cyber Security
item.description: Developed four Python scripts for brute-force simulation, data scraping, IP extraction, and DNS port confirmation for cybersecurity analysis.

item.title: Airline Management System
item.description: Database management system for airline operations with booking and management features.

item.title: ARM Embedded AI Lab on PC using Hypervisor
item.description: Simulated ARM64 systems on PC using hypervisor for embedded AI testing in drones, robotics, and aerospace without physical hardware.

item.title: Super Store Management System
item.description: Web-based store management system for inventory and sales tracking.
